title: Why do we Take Dorans Blade Over a Long Sword?
body:
Yes, its a dumb question, but I don't really think I understand the full answer. Why exactly is the 80 health game so game breaking that were willing to slow down our builds? Don't you technically get more health out of 3 pots? 

I'm aware I must sound crazy.. but im tried of not understanding why we do what we do in this game.

replies.body:
80 hp at early lvls can make a difference between life and death. Plus it gives you life steal.
But if you dont feel you need to take dorans over long sword feel free to buy it :)

Dont forget the 3% lifesteal! 

Dorans items are very cost efficient if you can benefit from all 3 factors. If you dont benefit from all 3, you probably are best starting off with long sword.
Harder to burst down plus you get a little bit of life steal as sustain. Champions that like to do burst like Riven or Zed, though, start longsword 3 pots, though.

Because that 80 heath can be the difference between winning a trade or losing it, it all depends really.

There isnâ€™t anything wrong with either start though honestly
play with a longsword instead if you can't tell a difference.
With tons of champions dealing well over 100% of your maximum health in a single rotation, the extra 80 health will help keep you barely alive when you manage to dodge 50% of their combo.
